DOC.brief_summary: This randomize study design evaluate efficacy safety IPu-infused liatermin ( 15mg/putamen/day ) compare placebo subject symptomatic , levodopa-response Parkinson 's disease . This study consist 90-day evaluation period follow implantation IPu delivery system 6-month double-blind treatment period .
DOC.brief_title: Study Liatermin ( r-metHuGDNF ) Administered Bilateral Intraputaminal ( IPu ) Infusion Subjects With Idiopathic Parkinson 's Disease
